text: @ChefDad17 @IdleMrBridle @PeteBlanchard @seanboy_50 The 1st Mechanised Corps was almost entirely equipped with them.  They fought in Berlin and there's loads of photographs of them fighting in the streets around Charlottenburg. Not to be confused with the 1st Guards Mechanised Corps (also equipped with M4s) that fought in Austria.

@SoozleMcDoozle I lived in the Kreuzberg (FRD) portion of Freidrichsain-Kreuzburg, and the Freidrichshain (DDR) portion was only a block or two away, but it still had perceptible differences. I used to sit and read in a park that replaced part of the Berlin Wall between the two areas.

@ciabaudo @jed_mercurio @BenMacintyre1 @FinancialTimes I don't know Kreuzberg that well, just for an article. I did go to Berlin 3 times in the 80's [when I lived in Munich-Innsbruck], modelling, but was too busy to poke around and my life was different, it was show biz, I was totally naive.

@chrisseventeen Great pic of them!I met Nikki when he came to Berlin in 1989. We were neighbors on Reichenberger Strasse. We often played guitar together, went through Kreuzberg and had a lot of fun. Then unfortunately I lost sight of him.
@auto_schmidt @lklundin @elonmusk Wedding is Mitte and Grünheide is Berlin. That is just a question of the observation distance. "Soon from Berlin" is a headline in the FAZ on Model Y.

@Rosenthal4USA @EllaLouise68 @NikkiFried *Things my dad told me while waiting for his booster shot today: I knew he served in Berlin after WWII, but today he told the pharmacist he was at Spandau Prison and guarded Rudolph Hesse. He's never told us this before. Amazing.

so and when noone tells the story of the white working class woman from Berlin Wedding and the ambitious and musical but poor gypsy boy from Silesia who founded a family in the midst of the war, who will know about them? one day they would have over 35 grand-grand-children..
This is a service tweet for those in Berlin (Wedding in particular) looking for an answer: @vodafone_de cable internet and @o2de mobile internet are both pretty much dead in the whole neighborhood!

Things I'm looking forward to in 2022:

🎉 Becoming a Grandad 
🎉 Husband's 50th in Berlin 🤞
🎉 @MrMosschops and @J3NNJ's wedding in San Diego
🎉 Griff live
🎉 ABBA Voyage 
🎉 SIX 

What about you? 🤔 #2022NewYear
